instructions.title: How to Play
instructions.step0: Order biblical events chronologically by placing each card in its correct position on the timeline.
instructions.step1: You will be shown a card with a biblical event
instructions.step2: Drag and drop the card to the correct position on the timeline
instructions.step3: If you place it correctly, you'll earn a point and continue
instructions.step4: If you make a mistake, the game will end
instructions.tip1: Carefully read the date and event on each card
instructions.tip2: Remember that BC (Before Christ) goes in descending order
instructions.tip3: AD (Anno Domini) dates go in ascending order
